mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (course_id, course_name, credit, course_type, teacher_id, class_time, class_location, capacity, selected_num, intro, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{courseName}, #{credit}, #{courseType}, #{teacherId}, #{classTime}, #{classLocation}, #{capacity}, #{selectedNum}, #{intro}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET course_name = #{courseName}, credit = #{credit}, course_type = #{courseType}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, class_time = #{classTime}, class_location = #{classLocation}, capacity = #{capacity}, intro = #{intro}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET selected_num = selected_num + #{changeNum}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
